description:
In Golf: Hole in One you can play a round of golf anytime with no worries; just sit back, play, and relax!

Your goal is to find the perfect angle and power for every stroke, to be able to get a hole in one in every course. 

* 70 levels designed to challenge you
* A large diversity of different obstacles to overcome
* 7 different diverse environments for you to experience
* Minimalistic vibes
* Calming soundtrack to make your golfing journey more complete

Will you be able to find the right strength and angle for each of the 70 levels?
name: Golf: Hole in One
intro: Try and score in just one stroke in this relaxing singleplayer, minimalist golf puzzle game. You don't need friends or the internet, just play and relax with anytime with the game!
